text: Kamla Beniwal (12 January 1927 - 15 May 2024) was an Indian politician. She was a senior member of Indian National Congress party. In 2009, she was Governor of Tripura. From 2009 to 2014, she was Governor of Gujarat. In 2014, Beniwal was Governor of Mizoram. Beniwal died on 15 May 2024 at a private hospital in Jaipur, India after a brief illness, aged 97. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Governors of Tripura Category:Governors of Gujarat Category:Governors of Mizoram
title: Kamla Beniwal
